Major_Arcs.title: Circus Performance and Trouble
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the circus setting and the character of Paul Bunyan, transitioning into a conflict involving a man in a checkered shirt and circus strongman Billings, escalating to violence and an offer of a new job.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan performing at the circus and a man hearing about the circus arriving in town, setting the stage for the circus narrative.

sub_scenes.title: Trouble and New Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the man in the checkered shirt investigating a disturbance, confronting Billings, facing violence, and ultimately being offered a job by the circus owner.

Major_Arcs.title: Grasso's Revenge and Foiled Plans
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Matto Grasso's attempts to sabotage Paul Bunyan's success at the circus, first through arson and then by releasing a dangerous ape, both of which are thwarted by Paul Bunyan.

sub_scenes.title: Arson Attempt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases Matto Grasso's envy and his plan to set the circus tent on fire, culminating in Paul Bunyan extinguishing the flames.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Ape Release Attempt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Grasso's second revenge scheme to release an ape, which is again foiled by Paul Bunyan, leading to a chase.

narrative_arcs.title: The Ape's Release and the Keeper's Reaction

Major_Arcs.title: The Chase and Paul Bunyan's Triumph
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the chaotic chase of Grasso through the circus arena, Paul Bunyan's intervention, and the eventual capture and comeuppance of Grasso, leading to Paul Bunyan's job offer and subsequent rejection.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase Begins in the Arena
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the chase within the arena, with warnings and attempts to intercept the fleeing Grasso.

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Defeat and Comeuppance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the physical confrontation between Paul Bunyan and Grasso, culminating in Grasso being tossed onto a trapeze and apprehended.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's encounter with the Ogress of Tibet, starting with a mysterious encounter and leading to a confrontation and escape from her castle, incorporating elements of magic and folklore.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Encounter and Talking Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo in Tibet and his bizarre encounter with a talking severed head in a forest, receiving a magical dagger as a gift.

narrative_arcs.title: The Talking Head's Gratitude and Guidance

sub_scenes.title: Hi-toun and the Castle Trap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Marco Polo's arrival in Hi-toun, his offer to help find Princess Lotus, and his encounter with the Ogress disguised as a distressed woman, leading him into her castle trap.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Arrives in Mourning Hi-toun and Offers Assistance
Encounter with the Distressed Woman and the Suspicious Castle
Entering the Mysterious Castle and Unmasking the Ogress
Confrontation with the Ogress and Her Tusked Mice

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Defeat and Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco Polo's escape from the Ogress's castle, his encounter with another captive, and their escape using the magical dagger.

narrative_arcs.title: Despair and Discovery of a Weapon
Dungeon Escape and Journey to Father
Palace Arrival, Reunion, and Refused Reward

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a tale of betrayal and revenge centered around a stolen treasure, starting with a prologue and progressing through a prison deal, betrayal, and violent retribution.

sub_scenes.title: Prologue and Prison Deal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage with a treasure keeper's prologue and then shifts to a penal colony where a prisoner proposes a deal to the Captain involving a hidden treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Map Exchange and Promise of Freedom

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Revenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the Captain's betrayal, the prisoner Jordan's imprisonment, his release after years, and his return to England vowing revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Return to England and Renewed Vow of Revenge

sub_scenes.title: Attic Confrontation and Downfall
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the confrontation in the attic over the treasure, leading to violence, murder, and the eventual capture of the murderer.

narrative_arcs.title: Violent Confrontation and Claim of Victory
Moral of the Story: Money is Evil

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features Dr. Styx investigating supernatural occurrences at the Matthews estate, leading to a confrontation with a ghost, and resolving the haunting through forgiveness and love.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and the Case
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and the case of the haunted Matthews estate, setting up his investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Realtor and the Supernatural Expert Discuss the Matthews Estate
Arrival at the Haunted Matthews Place

sub_scenes.title: Confronting the Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Mr. Northrup entering the haunted house and immediately encountering the ghost of Vincent Matthews, leading to a physical and verbal confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Ignoring the Warning and Entering the Haunted House
Confrontation with the Ghostly Figure Inside the House
Unwavering Confrontation and Declaration of Intent
Desperate Struggle and Reversal of Fortune

sub_scenes.title: Resolution through Forgiveness and Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the resolution of the haunting through forgiveness and love, as the man in brown coat helps Vincent's sister, Rosalind, forgive him, leading to his liberation and peace.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning Violence, Fear, and the Path to Salvation
The Revelation of Rosalind's Murder and Fate

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Ill-fated Voyage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates Henry Hudson's final voyage to find the Northwest Passage, from the initial proposal to the tragic mutiny and his unknown fate.

sub_scenes.title: Mission and Voyage Start
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the historical context of Henry Hudson's voyage, the Dutch East India Company's proposal, and Hudson's acceptance and the initial stages of the journey.

narrative_arcs.title: The Enigma of Henry Hudson's Last Voyage
The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Captain Hudson
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Disillusionment and the Decision to Turn Back

sub_scenes.title: Mutiny and Unknown Fate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the renewed voyage, the ship getting trapped in ice, the rising discontent among the crew, and the eventual mutiny that leads to Hudson being set adrift.

narrative_arcs.title: Trapped in Ice and Growing Despair
The Ice Melts and Voyage Resumes

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Tartar Leader
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the Arabian Knight Hassan's mission to rescue a kidnapped woman from the Tartar leader Kurgan, culminating in a trial by combat and a bittersweet resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Mission Briefing and Desert Journey
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Arabian Knight, the Tartar threat, Hassan's summons by the Caliph, and his initial journey into the desert to rescue the kidnapped daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: The Arabian Knight's Introduction and the Tartar Threat
Summoned by the Caliph for a Rescue Mission
The Journey to the Oasis of El-Sholem
Deserted Oasis and Discovery of Tartar Trail
Encounter and Warning from a Traveler
Offer of Water and Doubt on the Mission

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan reaching the Tartar camp, infiltrating it using disguise, and then being discovered and captured by Tartar guards.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambush and Subjugation of the Sentry

sub_scenes.title: Trial by Combat and Bittersweet Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Kurgan's challenge of trial by combat, the brutal fights Hassan endures, Kurgan honoring his word, and the woman's explanation and farewell kiss to Hassan.

narrative_arcs.title: Kurgan Keeps His Word and Bids Farewell
Woman Explains the Kiss and Praises Hassan
